## ItemsService.getDefaultModel() method

Gets a default model for the specified model type. The returned model can be used for item creation. This operation returns an instance of 'IdentifiableObject' type, as implemented by one of the following:<ul class="model-list"><li><span>ApprovalStatus</span></li><li><span>Bundle</span></li><li><span>BusinessProcessType</span></li><li><span>Category</span></li><li><span>Component</span></li><li><span>ComponentTemplate</span></li><li><span>Folder</span></li><li><span>Group</span></li><li><span>Keyword</span></li><li><span>MultimediaType</span></li><li><span>Page</span></li><li><span>PageTemplate</span></li><li><span>Publication</span></li><li><span>Schema</span></li><li><span>SearchFolder</span></li><li><span>StructureGroup</span></li><li><span>TargetGroup</span></li><li><span>TargetType</span></li><li><span>TemplateBuildingBlock</span></li><li><span>TridionProcessDefinition</span></li><li><span>User</span></li></ul>

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getDefaultModel(modelType: 'Bundle' | 'SearchFolder' | 'Schema' | 'Page' | 'PageTemplate' | 'Component' | 'ComponentTemplate' | 'Folder' | 'Keyword' | 'StructureGroup' | 'TemplateBuildingBlock' | 'Publication' | 'Category' | 'Group' | 'ProcessDefinition' | 'BusinessProcessType' | 'MultimediaType' | 'TargetType' | 'User' | 'TargetGroup' | 'ApprovalStatus', containerId?: string): CancelablePromise<IdentifiableObject>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| modelType   | 'Bundle' \| 'SearchFolder' \| 'Schema' \| 'Page' \| 'PageTemplate' \| 'Component' \| 'ComponentTemplate' \| 'Folder' \| 'Keyword' \| 'StructureGroup' \| 'TemplateBuildingBlock' \| 'Publication' \| 'Category' \| 'Group' \| 'ProcessDefinition' \| 'BusinessProcessType' \| 'MultimediaType' \| 'TargetType' \| 'User' \| 'TargetGroup' \| 'ApprovalStatus' | The type of data model that will be created.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| containerId | string                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | _(Optional)_ The TCM URI of the organizational item to use as a container for the specified Model Type. A container ID is required for all types except the following: Batch, Publication, PublicationTarget, PublishTransaction, TargetType, MultimediaType, WorkflowType, User, Group, and ApprovalStatus. |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IdentifiableObject](./open-api-client.identifiableobject.md)<!-- -->&gt;
